echoink.mp4.description: Pip discovers a sound reactive ink board that turns his squeaks into shimmering floating artwork—and gets adorably booped by living paint. 🎨✨ #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #EchoInk #MagicWorkshop #WhimsicalScience #OtterInventor
